channel.title: NPC drops in Cheezscape 80
channel.description:
I cant get it quite to work. It works well for random items and random coins, the thing is I just want to make it so that a Tyras Guard(1200) drops 1Mil when you kill it. I tried to use the NPCDROPS.CFG file but that did not work at all.
So if any one knows please post.
